titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Jesse Helms in the case of Tayoun v. Foglietta, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/2/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Helms, North Carolina, in the case of Tayoun v. Foglietta, et al.
